mapper.select: select IFNULL(EP_ID,'') AS epId, IFNULL(HONOR_ID,'') AS honorId, IFNULL(HONOR_DESC,'') AS honorDesc, CERT_DATE AS certDate, IFNULL(CERT_ISSUER,'') AS certIssuer from SL_EP_HONOR where EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND DEL_FLG= 0

select IFNULL(EP_ID,'') AS epId, IFNULL(FTY_ASSET,'') AS ftyAsset, IFNULL(FTY_REG_CAPITAL,'') AS ftyRegCapital, IFNULL(FTY_LAND_AREA,'') AS ftyLandArea, IFNULL(FTY_FLOOR_AREA,'') AS ftyFloorArea, IFNULL(FTY_EQUIPMENT,'') AS ftyEquipment, IFNULL(FTY_DESIGN_CAP,'') AS ftyDesignCap, IFNULL(FTY_ACTUAL_CAP,'') AS ftyActualCap, IFNULL(FTY_FT_RATE,'') AS ftyFtRate, IFNULL(FTY_DS_RATE,'') AS ftyDsRate, IFNULL(FTY_AS_RATE,'') AS ftyAsRate from SL_EP_CAP where EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND DEL_FLG= 0
